page.title: 18Modern Popular Music
page.content: Modern music is great. It appeals to most age groups; children, teenagers, and adults. Quite often my Dad buys a record which is my favorite as well. You can also listen to music on the radio or television. There is a two hour radio program of the top forty hit records on a Sunday evening, and 'Top of the Pops' on a Thursday on the T.V. Some of the sounds of the eighties are reminiscent of the sixties. Rhythmn and blues, Soul, and Rock and Roll are still alive. There are 'casual' groups such as Duran Duran, Spandau Ballet, Wham, Nick Kershaw, and Culture Club. Recently there has been a wave of 'Gender Bending', where men dress effeminately, (started by The New York Dolls), such as Boy George, Divine and Marilyn. New digitised music can give us nearly perfect sound reproduction.
